projects_js.header: Web app: Custom Wow Item Tooltips
projects_js.description: Custom World of Warcraft item tooltips. Made as an exercise in CSS and JS.

projects_js.header: Web app: Eve Online Tech Tree
projects_js.description: Recreation of the Ship Tech Tree in the browser from the game EVE online. Made as an exercise in HTML, CSS and JS.

projects_csharp.description: Completed Contoso Universety tutorial from microsoft. Additionally implemented Repository Pattern and automapper in the Web-Api.
WPF desktop App for XSD verification and XSLT Transformations, also allows for easy viewing and editing of XML files via DataGrid(WPF).
Console app and wpf app that both use backgroundworkers to read/write from the same file, thus being able to edit/remove/add from both apps in real time. backgroundworkers run on threads.
